insert into sim_sale_items (id, sale_id, product_name, tax_rate_id, tax, quantity, unit_price, subtotal, tax_amt, details, net_unit_price, real_unit_price, discount, discount_amt, tax_method ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taxMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sim_sale_items set sale_id = #{saleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_rate_id = #{taxRateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tax = #{tax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tax_amt = #{taxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, details = #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, net_unit_price = #{netUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, real_unit_price = #{realUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_amt = #{discountAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tax_method = #{taxMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
